title: Our Elections Are Safe and Secure!
itunes:title: Our Elections Are Safe and Secure!
description:
On Wednesday night, Joe Biden visited the D.C. homeless shelter formerly known as Union Station to make his final pitch to the electorate. The result was a gift to the MAGA movement — a final nudge for any voters on the fence. Charlie breaks down the real meaning of the president's "democracy" language, then asks the questions many Americans are wondering: What about the state of our elections? Why will it take days, or longer, to declare a winner?

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
